short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that captures selected text and displays it on editor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome Editor allows you to run modern JavaScript syntax with features such as code formatting, dark mode, auto-execution option, font size adjustments, and a context menu for code selection. Enhance your coding experience with this powerful tool.
